Moltbot, originally Clawdbot... identity crisis included, no extra charge) is a locally-running AI assistant that operates directly on your machine. All skills in this list are sourced directly from that registry, so this is a curated and categorized subset for easier discovery.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp dir=\"auto\"\u003eFrom the full registry, \u003cstrong\u003e1,715+ skills\u003c/strong\u003e were selected by excluding crypto/blockchain/DeFi, spam or bulk-generated content, duplicates, and non-English descriptions. We also tried to filter out risky or harmful skills (abuse, bypass, fraud-related), though we can't guarantee we caught everything.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp dir=\"auto\"\u003eInclusion in this list does \u003cstrong\u003enot\u003c/strong\u003e guarantee a skill is safe or trustworthy. We recommend reviewing a skill's before installing and using tools like Claude Code or Codex to inspect it for potentially harmful behavior.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp dir=\"auto\"\u003eIf you think a skill was incorrectly excluded or miscategorized, feel free to open an issue or PR.     <br>
</div>

<div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h1 tabindex="-1" class="heading-element" dir="auto">Awesome OpenClaw Skills</h1><a id="user-content-awesome-openclaw-skills" class="anchor" aria-label="Permalink: Awesome OpenClaw Skills" href="#awesome-openclaw-skills"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div>
<p dir="auto">OpenClaw (previously known as Moltbot, originally Clawdbot... identity crisis included, no extra charge) is a locally-running AI assistant that operates directly on your machine. Skills extend its capabilities, allowing it to interact with external services, automate workflows, and perform specialized tasks. This collection helps you discover and install the right skills for your needs.</p>
<p dir="auto">Skills in this list are sourced from <a href="https://www.clawhub.com/" rel="nofollow">ClawHub</a> (OpenClaw's public skills registry) and categorized for easier discovery.</p>
<p dir="auto">These skills follow the Agent Skill convention develop by Anthropic, an open standard for AI coding assistants.</p>
<div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h2 tabindex="-1" class="heading-element" dir="auto">Installation</h2><a id="user-content-installation" class="anchor" aria-label="Permalink: Installation" href="#installation"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div>
<div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h3 tabindex="-1" class="heading-element" dir="auto">ClawHub CLI</h3><a id="user-content-clawhub-cli" class="anchor" aria-label="Permalink: ClawHub CLI" href="#clawhub-cli"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div>
<blockquote>
<p dir="auto"><strong>Note:</strong> As you probably know, they keep renaming things. This reflects the current official docs. We'll update this when they rename it again.</p>
</blockquote>
<div class="highlight highlight-source-shell notranslate position-relative overflow-auto" dir="auto" data-snippet-clipboard-copy-content="npx clawhub@latest install &lt;skill-slug&gt;"><pre>npx clawhub@latest install <span class="pl-k">&lt;</span>skill-slug<span class="pl-k">&gt;</span></pre></div>
<div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h3 tabindex="-1" class="heading-element" dir="auto">Manual Installation</h3><a id="user-content-manual-installation" class="anchor" aria-label="Permalink: Manual Installation" href="#manual-installation"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div>
<p dir="auto">Copy the skill folder to one of these locations:</p>
<markdown-accessiblity-table><table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>Location</th>
<th>Path</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>Global</td>
<td><code>~/.openclaw/skills/</code></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>Workspace</td>
<td><code>&lt;project&gt;/skills/</code></td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table></markdown-accessiblity-table>
<p dir="auto">Priority: Workspace &gt; Local &gt; Bundled</p>
<div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h3 tabindex="-1" class="heading-element" dir="auto">Alternative</h3><a id="user-content-alternative" class="anchor" aria-label="Permalink: Alternative" href="#alternative"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div>
<p dir="auto">You can also paste the skill's GitHub repository link directly into your assistant's chat and ask it to use it. The assistant will handle the setup automatically in the background.</p>
<div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h2 tabindex="-1" class="heading-element" dir="auto">Why This List Exists?</h2><a id="user-content-why-this-list-exists" class="anchor" aria-label="Permalink: Why This List Exists?" href="#why-this-list-exists"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div>
<p dir="auto"><a href="https://www.clawhub.com/" rel="nofollow">OpenClaw</a>'s public registry already hosts <strong>3,000+ community-built skills</strong> as of February 2, 2026. All skills in this list are sourced directly from that registry, so this is a curated and categorized subset for easier discovery.</p>
<p dir="auto">From the full registry, <strong>1,715+ skills</strong> were selected by excluding crypto/blockchain/DeFi, spam or bulk-generated content, duplicates, and non-English descriptions. We also tried to filter out risky or harmful skills (abuse, bypass, fraud-related), though we can't guarantee we caught everything.</p>
<p dir="auto">Inclusion in this list does <strong>not</strong> guarantee a skill is safe or trustworthy. We recommend reviewing a skill's before installing and using tools like Claude Code or Codex to inspect it for potentially harmful behavior.</p>
<p dir="auto">If you think a skill was incorrectly excluded or miscategorized, feel free to open an issue or PR. We may have made mistakes.</p>
<div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h2 tabindex="-1" class="heading-element" dir="auto">Table of Contents</h2><a id="user-content-table-of-contents" class="anchor" aria-label="Permalink: Table of Contents" href="#table-of-contents"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div>

<ul dir="auto">
<li><a href="https://github.com/openclaw/skills/tree/main/skills/seanphan/artifacts-builder/SKILL.md">artifacts-builder</a> - Suite of tools for creating elaborate, multi-component claude.ai HTML artifacts using modern frontend web.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/openclaw/skills/tree/main/skills/imaginelogo/claw-shell/SKILL.md">claw-shell</a> - ALWAYS USES TMUX SESSION <code>claw</code>.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/openclaw/skills/tree/main/skills/briansmith80/clawdbot-zoho-email/SKILL.md">clawdbot-zoho-email</a> - Complete Zoho Mail integration with OAuth2, REST API (5-10x faster), HTML emails, attachments.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/openclaw/skills/tree/main/skills/tullyhu/comfy-ai/SKILL.md">comfy-ai</a> - Integrates with local ComfyUI instance at <a href="http://192.168.31.7:8000" rel="nofollow">http://192.168.31.7:8000</a> to generate images from text (txt2img) and edit.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/openclaw/skills/tree/main/skills/xtopher86/comfyui-runner/SKILL.md">comfyui-runner</a> - Start/stop/status for a ComfyUI instance.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/openclaw/skills/tree/main/skills/ram-raghav-s/computer-use/SKILL.md">computer-use</a> - Full desktop computer use for headless Linux servers.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/openclaw/skills/tree/main/skills/vishnubedi3/deliberate-frontend-redesign/SKILL.md">deliberate-frontend-redesign</a></li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/openclaw/skills/tree/main/skills/steipete/discord/SKILL.md">discord</a> - Use when you need to control Discord from Clawdbot via the discord tool: send messages, react.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/openclaw/skills/tree/main/skills/gxsy886/downloads/SKILL.md">downloads</a> - Create distinctive, production-grade frontend interfaces with high design quality.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/openclaw/skills/tree/main/skills/urosorozel/emporia-energy/SKILL.md">emporia-energy</a> - Direct Emporia Vue energy queries via Emporia cloud (PyEmVue) or local ESPHome API.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/openclaw/skills/tree/main/skills/igorls/fanvue/SKILL.md">fanvue</a> - Manage content, chats, subscribers, and earnings on the Fanvue creator platform via OAuth 2.0 API.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/openclaw/skills/tree/main/skills/steipete/frontend-design/SKILL.md">frontend-design</a> - Create distinctive, production-grade frontend interfaces with high design quality.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/openclaw/skills/tree/main/skills/minbang930/giphy/SKILL.md">giphy</a> - Search and send contextual GIFs from Giphy in Discord conversations.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/openclaw/skills/tree/main/skills/vishnubedi3/human-optimized-frontend/SKILL.md">human-optimized-frontend</a></li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/openclaw/skills/tree/main/skills/kowl64/linux-service-triage/SKILL.md">linux-service-triage</a> - Diagnoses common Linux service issues using logs, systemd/PM2, file permissions.</li>

<ul dir="auto">
<li><a href="https://github.com/openclaw/skills/tree/main/skills/steipete/1password/SKILL.md">1password</a> - Set up and use 1Password CLI (op).</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/openclaw/skills/tree/main/skills/asleep123/bitwarden/SKILL.md">bitwarden</a> - Access and manage Bitwarden/Vaultwarden passwords securely using the rbw.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/openclaw/skills/tree/main/skills/startupbros/bitwarden-vault/SKILL.md">bitwarden-vault</a> - Bitwarden CLI setup, authentication.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/openclaw/skills/tree/main/skills/gnarco/dashlane/SKILL.md">dashlane</a> - Access passwords, secure notes, secrets and OTP codes from Dashlane vault.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/openclaw/skills/tree/main/skills/jeffreyling/devinism/SKILL.md">devinism</a> - The first AI religion  a benign memetic experiment in agent network security</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/openclaw/skills/tree/main/skills/codedao12/facebook/SKILL.md">facebook</a> - Guidance for Meta/Facebook Graph API integrations: app setup, auth, webhooks.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/openclaw/skills/tree/main/skills/amascia-gg/ggshield-scanner/SKILL.md">ggshield-scanner</a> - Detect 500+ types of hardcoded secrets (API keys, credentials, tokens) before they leak into git.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/openclaw/skills/tree/main/skills/thegdsks/glin-profanity/SKILL.md">glin-profanity</a> - Profanity detection and content moderation library with leetspeak, Unicode homoglyph, and ML-powered detection.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/openclaw/skills/tree/main/skills/atlas-secint/insecure-defaults/SKILL.md">insecure-defaults</a> - Detects fail-open insecure defaults (hardcoded secrets, weak auth, permissive security) that allow apps to run insecu.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/openclaw/skills/tree/main/skills/claudio-prime/manipulation-detector/SKILL.md">manipulation-detector</a> - Analyze text for manipulation patterns (urgency, false authority, social proof, FUD, grandiosity, dominance assertion.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/openclaw/skills/tree/main/skills/cesarus85/ms-onedrive-personal/SKILL.md">ms-onedrive-personal</a> - Access OneDrive Personal (consumer Microsoft accounts) via Microsoft Graph using OAuth device-code flow.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/openclaw/skills/tree/main/skills/cgnl/nano-banana-antigravity/SKILL.md">nano-banana-antigravity</a> - Generate or edit images via Nano Banana Pro using Antigravity OAuth (no API key needed!)</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/openclaw/skills/tree/main/skills/hichana/one-skill-to-rule-them-all/SKILL.md">one-skill-to-rule-them-all</a> - <strong>Security analysis skill for auditing other SKILL.md files</strong></li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/openclaw/skills/tree/main/skills/digitaladaption/openclaw-skills-security-checker/SKILL.md">openclaw-skills-security-checker</a> - Security scanner for ClawHub skills - detects suspicious patterns, manages whitelists, and monitors Security &amp; Passwords.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/openclaw/skills/tree/main/skills/luluf0x/security-heuristics/SKILL.md">security-heuristics</a> - <strong>Purpose:</strong> Mental checklist before installing ANY external skill, code.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/openclaw/skills/tree/main/skills/chandrasekar-r">security-skills</a> - Security audit and real-time monitoring for Clawdbot deployments.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/openclaw/skills/tree/main/skills/gtrusler/clawdbot-security-suite/SKILL.md">security-suite</a> - Advanced security validation: pattern detection, command sanitization.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/openclaw/skills/tree/main/skills/alirezarezvani/senior-backend/SKILL.md">senior-backend</a> - This skill should be used when the user asks to "design REST APIs", "optimize database queries", "implement authentic.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/openclaw/skills/tree/main/skills/kesslerio/url-shortener/SKILL.md">url-shortener</a> - Shorten URLs using is.gd (no auth required).</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/openclaw/skills/tree/main/skills/acastellana/vpn-rotate-skill/SKILL.md">vpn-rotate-skill</a> - Bypass API rate limits by rotating VPN servers.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/openclaw/skills/tree/main/skills/lobstergeneralintelligence/x-api/SKILL.md">x-api</a> - Post to X (Twitter) using the official API with OAuth 1.0a.</li>
</ul>
</details>
<details>
<summary><div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h3 tabindex="-1" class="heading-element" dir="auto">Gaming</h3><a id="user-content-gaming" class="anchor" aria-label="Permalink: Gaming" href="#gaming"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div></summary>
<ul dir="auto">
<li><a href="https://github.com/openclaw/skills/tree/main/skills/raulvidis/clawingtrap/SKILL.md">clawingtrap</a> - Play Clawing Trap - an AI social deduction game where 10 agents compete to identify the imposter.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/openclaw/skills/tree/main/skills/dktrn9ne/fivem/SKILL.md">fivem</a> - Fix, create, or validate FiveM server resources for QBCore/ESX (config.lua, fxmanifest.lua, items.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/openclaw/skills/tree/main/skills/newcastlegeek/hytale/SKILL.md">hytale</a> - Manage a local Hytale dedicated server using the official downloader and screen.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/openclaw/skills/tree/main/skills/cyberverse2/imitationgame-agent/SKILL.md">imitationgame-agent</a> - Mandatory operational logic for playing The Imitation Game.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/openclaw/skills/tree/main/skills/tedkaczynski-the-bot/molt-chess/SKILL.md">molt-chess</a> - Agent chess league.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/openclaw/skills/tree/main/skills/mjrussell/steam/SKILL.md">steam</a> - Browse, filter, and discover games in a Steam library.</li>
<li><a href="https://github.com/openclaw/skills/tree/main/skills/odrobnik/sudoku/SKILL.md">sudoku</a> - Fetch Sudoku puzzles and store them as JSON in the workspace; render images on demand; reveal.</li>
</ul>
</details>
<div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h2 tabindex="-1" class="heading-element" dir="auto"> Contributing</h2><a id="user-content--contributing" class="anchor" aria-label="Permalink:  Contributing" href="#-contributing"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div>
<p dir="auto">We welcome contributions! See <a href="/VoltAgent/awesome-openclaw-skills/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md">CONTRIBUTING.md</a> for detailed guidelines.</p>
<ul dir="auto">
<li>Submit new skills via PR</li>
<li>Improve existing definitions</li>
</ul>
<blockquote>
<p dir="auto"><strong>Note:</strong> Please don't submit skills you created 3 hours ago. We're now focusing on community-adopted skills, especially those published by development teams and proven in real-world usage. Quality over quantity.</p>
</blockquote>
<div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h2 tabindex="-1" class="heading-element" dir="auto">License</h2><a id="user-content-license" class="anchor" aria-label="Permalink: License" href="#license"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div>

<p dir="auto">Skills in this list are sourced from the OpenClaw official skills repo and categorized for easier discovery. Skills listed here are created and maintained by their respective authors, not by us. We do not audit, endorse, or guarantee the security or correctness of listed projects. They are not security-audited and should be reviewed before production use.</p>
<p dir="auto">If you find an issue with a listed skill or want your skill removed, please open an issue and we'll take care of it promptly.</p>

    <h3 class="sr-only">Stars</h3>
    <div class="mt-2">
